title: Ticket #2203: Gridmanager crash caused by missing proxy attribute in cream job ads
description:
If a CREAM job is missing the x509userproxy job attribute, the CreamJob destructor will free a couple uninitialized pointers, corrupting memory.

Condor_submit usually prevents this situation, but the job router can easily create proxy-less jobs.
